mapper.insert: insert into t_yc_profile ( user_id, nick_name, role_id, user_img, sex, age, address_id, address_detail, postcode, phone, email, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{user_id}, #{nick_name}, (SELECT role_id FROM t_yc_role WHERE role_name = '普通用户'), #{user_img}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{address_id}, #{address_detail}, #{postcode}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{create_time}, #{update_time} )
mapper.select: select u.user_id,u.user_name,u.password from t_yc_user u where u.user_name = #{user_name} and u.valid = 1

select p.user_id,p.nick_name,r.role_name,p.user_img,p.sex,p.age,p.address_id,p.address_detail,p.postcode,p.phone,p.email from t_yc_profile p, t_yc_role r where p.user_id = #{user_id} and p.role_id = r.role_id
mapper.update: update t_yc_user set password = #{password} where user_id = #{user_id}

update t_yc_profile set nick_name = #{nick_name}, user_img = #{user_img}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, address_id = #{address_id}, address_detail = #{address_detail}, postcode = #{postcode}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, verson = (SELECT t.verson + 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM t_yc_profile WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) t), update_time = #{update_time} where user_id = #{user_id}
